text: The Invisible Man is an American-Australian 2020 science fiction horror movie written and directed by Leigh Whannell. It is about a woman who believes she is being stalked by her abusive and rich boyfriend even after his suicide. The movie stars Elisabeth Moss, Aldis Hodge, Storm Reid, Harriet Dyer, Michael Dorman, and Oliver Jackson-Cohen. The Invisible Man was released in the United States on February 28, 2020, by Universal Pictures to strong positive reviews. ==References== Category:2020 horror movies Category:2020 science fiction movies Category:2020s science fiction horror movies Category:American horror movies Category:American science fiction horror movies Category:Australian horror movies Category:Australian science fiction movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in the 2020s Category:Movies set in San Francisco Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies composed by Benjamin Wallfisch
title: The Invisible Man (2020 movie)
